bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: John Lyle Campbell was a professor of chemistry Washington and Lee University from 1851-1886.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains eight letters to Campbell, a notebook on Campbell's geological observations, and miscellaneous papers including a broadside.
